game.name: Time Lock VR 1
game.categories: Single-player, Tracked Controller Support, VR Only, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A VR puzzle game with sci-fi and escape room elements: control time, solve challenges, fight enemies, and explore worlds across different timelines.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A VR puzzle game with sci-fi and escape room elements: control time, solve challenges, fight enemies, and explore worlds across different timelines.

reviewHighlights.text: A great game for fans of VR and virtual adventures. I recommend it to anyone who appreciates unusual game mechanics and quality of execution!
Bought it out of curiosity and got one of the most memorable VR adventures. Smart puzzles, great atmosphere, and a mechanic that makes putting on the...
